title: Tottenham vs Bayern Munich: Player ratings as Serge Gnabry and Robert Lewandowski shine
text:
Tottenham Hotspur fell to a humiliating defeat against a clinical Bayern side in Tuesday night’s Champions League meeting.

A second-half Serge Gnabry hat-trick and a Robert Lewandowski brace took the game beyond a Spurs side that led early in the first half.

Tottenham were in the game for the most part, trailing 4-2 until a late flurry of goals from the ruthless visitors.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Mauricio Pochettino’s side are now left with just one point from their opening two games in Group B.

The manager and his team now have plenty of questions to answer before they are next in action against Brighton in the Premier League.
